'''The Tolkien Phenomenon''' was a conference in honour of the 100th anniversary of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. The papers from the conference were published in ''[[Scholarship and Fantasy|Scholarship and Fantasy: Proceedings of the Tolkien Phenomenon, Turku, May 1992]]''.
